data.oai_dc:dc: Community structure of hyperiid amphipod in the Southeast Pacific
Abundance standarized in individuals per m-3 of hyperiid amphipod found in the Southeast Pacific during the CIMAR 22 Oceanic Island cruise in 2016.

Abundance, AGS 61 Cabo de Hornos, Amphithyrus bispinosus, Amphithyrus muratus, Anchylomera blossevillei, Brachyscelus crusculum, Brachyscelus globiceps, Brachyscelus rapax, CIMAR-22, CIMAR-22_01_W,
